title: The Best of RISK! Music #18
description:
Our eighteenth collection of our favorite music from the most recent RISK! episodes.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Lauryn Hill, Saint Saviour, Willy Mason, The White Stripes, Beulahbelle, Linda Ronstadt, Television, Shawn Colvin, Louis Prima, LCD Soundsystem, Kate Bush, Kevin Allison, Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers, Prince, David Bowie, Cage the Elephant, Our Native Daughters, The Mavericks, The Flaming Lips, The New Pornographers, Martha Wainwright, Sinkane, Patty Griffin, The Rolling Stones, Stevie Wonder)
